title: More frequent buses for Route 525
articleContent:
More frequent buses for Route 525

From 28 November 2021, Route 525 Craigieburn Station â€“ Donnybrook Station via Mickleham will run more frequently, giving residents from Craigieburn, Donnybrook, Kalkallo and Mickleham more options on when to travel and better connections with train services.

  • During the morning peak towards Craigieburn Station, services will run every 17 to 22 minutes on weekdays.
  • During the afternoon peak towards Donnybrook Station, services will run every 12 to 32 minutes on weekdays.
  • Weekday services outside of peak times and weekend services will run every 40 minutes.

To plan your journey, view the new timetables for Route 525, visit Journey planner or call 1800 800 007 to order a printed copy of your timetable.
articleDescription: From Nov 2021, Route 525 will run more frequently, giving residents from Craigieburn, Donnybrook, Kalkallo & Mickleham more travel options.
